--- select_singer_with_full_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS A,
  Singers AS B

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      18,
            end:      30,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   26,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  29,
                end:  30,
                Name: "A",
              },
            },
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      34,
            end:      46,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  34,
              end:  41,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   42,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  45,
                end:  46,
                Name: "B",
              },
            },
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS A, Singers AS B
